title: Riot start sexualising males please
body: you got big tits and phat asses isnt it time for some massive junk and tight asses on male champs?

replies.body: Ryze has no shirt. Same with urgot and cho. Fizz doesnt wear pants. Panth has a mardi ggra skin. Braums pecs are mountainous.  Alistars nipples are almost always exposed.

It's a rouse, a ploy to get you to believe, really all SJW's are lesbians and only want females to exist.
They have more topless male skins then they do female.

Unfortunately, despite a recent increase, women really aren't the majority, or even close to equal representation, with males in the video game department. It's a matter of numbers. They please the majority to make the most money. If gaming had an 80% female representation, you could bet your ass the situation would be reversed.
Have you seen the bodies on male champs?!  They got toned ass muscles bulging out of everywhere... If that isn't male sexualisation idk what is.

You got your topless AND heart seeker Varus. (and manlytheon)
Now where is mai topless Ahri?

Well considering that would be highly inappropriate, as it could be classed as ecchi or even some form or hentai, which is extremely inappropriate to most players, as the community consists of players from the age of 6 (yes I have met some, they aren't very internet safe....) - 50+

But I have found the most common age to be 10-20 which is still inappropriate from more of that age group, therefore restricting this stupid idea, closest you would ever get is pool party ahri, which she is in a onesie, so you wouldn't get much anyway.
